#to print secret value 
echo "${{secrets.FTP_CERTS_BASE64 }}" | sed 's/./& /g'

Procedure to update cert data:

Fire this on PS:
openssl.exe s_client -connect h11.mijn.host:21 -starttls ftp -showcerts

Grab the section of output that would look like this, base64 encode it and overwrite the value of GitHub secret FTP_CERTS_BASE64:

---
Certificate chain
 0 s:CN = h11.mijn.host
   i:C = US, O = Let's Encrypt, CN = R3
-----BEGIN CERTIFICATE-----
